name: graph-get-license-and-signins
title: Get users by license and review last signed in
shortDescription: Obtain a report via the Microsoft Graph to extract the license and last signedin information to support a license review, for others to help remove any unused users

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Get users by license review last signed in

references.name: Want to learn more about Microsoft Graph PowerShell SDK and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the Microsoft Graph PowerShell SDK documentation site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
